text: Is it possible to add (add “url_repo”) a specific tag of an unregistered package or the way to go is to add the specific commit instead?

elements.text: Is it possible to add (add “url_repo”) a specific tag of an unregistered package or the way to go is to add the specific commit instead?

text: I believe you can target tags, releases, branches, or commits. See here <https://pkgdocs.julialang.org/v1/managing-packages/>

elements.text: I believe you can target tags, releases, branches, or commits. See here
